text: @billmaher Nope.  Just nope.  COVID-19 is nothing to screw around with.  If it doesn't kill you, it's causing scarring of lung tissue in some people. How about you ask the Administration to do its job and provide enough testing and tracing so that we can get rid of COVID-19?
